## IFileWriterFlags interface

Interface which represents the flags about which mode the file should be opened in.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IFileWriterFlags 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [append](./node-core-library.ifilewriterflags.append.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Open file for appending. |
|  [exclusive](./node-core-library.ifilewriterflags.exclusive.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Fails if path exists. The exclusive flag ensures that path is newly created. |
